Usage: <cmd> sitename1 sitename2 sitename3 [limit]
Limits the number of simultanious uploads per rip on the specified site.
0 means unlimited.
For eg to prevent dual uploading of the same rip: <cmd> HQ1 HQ2 HQ3 1
See also: <cmdprefix>maxupdn

You can use the special sitename * for site-generic rules.
